name: Adventure Time (Encond)
description:
This is Simple 2D Pixel-Art Platformer which was made only by me for fun, and training new skills.

Game doesn't have a ending, monsters can kill you, or you their.

A lot of stuff can be added and revamped but for now I don't plan it

Movements instructions:

  • A,D - Moving to direction
  • W,S - Raise or lower the camera
  • Space - For jump, can double jump
  • Escape - Pause/Main menu

Credits: 

Music: Sara Garrard - sonatina.itch.io

Sounds effects: Jalastram - jalastram.itch.io

Enemies:

  • Aamatniekss - aamatniekss.itch.io
  • Elthen - elthen.itch.io
